title: Heroes Novels Volume 2 - Nr 51 - 103 in 1110x1686 CBR Format
description:
These are the NBC online novels which tell backstories for the Heroes television series.

PDFs are a pain to read, so I converted them all to CBR, which are RARed JPGs.
I scaled down the resolution to 1110x1686, so the files are not that huge anymore.

I do use
CDisplay Image Display Program - version 1.8.1.0 by David Ayton
to read this with a forced height of each page of 1200 pixels.

Nr 51 - 103

Have fun!

Remember: Piratebay switched to the openbittorrent tracker, and so did I.

YOU NEED TO CHANGE THE TRACKER TO: <a href="
http://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce</a>
